1.0.name: wordpress/technorati-full-feeds
1.0.description: Technorati now requires Full Text feeds to participate in their directory and "topical authority" systems. If your blog uses the Summary feed option, then Technorati might ask you to change that option, or to make an exception so that Technorati can always see the Full Text. This plugin eliminates the work for you! Just install, activate, and forget about it.
